name: The World is Burning DEMO
description:
The World is Burning is a high anxiety, grid-based, block-busting, 2D action-escape game.

  • Race your way through mazes and obstacles to activate keys and unlock the exit. 
  • Break blocks to collect resources and activate consumable power-ups: Shockwave and Slow.
  • Don't get burned.

This is an early pre-release DEMO with 5 levels (good luck on level 5, sheesh).

Certain features and sounds are not yet implemented.

Input Support: Controller [highly recommended], keyboard only, or keyboard + mouse.

Windows only for now, more platforms planned.

Please comment with your thoughts, thanks!
